mapper.select: select tb_project.category2 category, sum(tb_give.giveMoney) total from tb_project join tb_give on tb_project.projectNo = tb_give.projectNo where to_Char(giveRegDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{_parameter} group by tb_project.category2

select tb_company.id as companyId, tb_company.companyName, tb_project.projectSubject, tb_project.totalMoney, tb_project.percent, tb_project.projectEnd, tb_member.dropFlag from tb_project right outer join tb_member on tb_project.id = tb_member.id left outer join tb_company on tb_member.id = tb_company.id where statusFlag = 2 order by tb_member.regDate

select tb_member.id as memberId, tb_member.name as memberName, tb_project.projectSubject, tb_give.giveMoney, tb_member.dropFlag from tb_member left outer join tb_give on tb_member.id = tb_give.id left outer join tb_project on tb_give.projectNo = tb_project.projectNo where statusFlag = 1 order by tb_member.regDate
mapper.update: update tb_member set dropFlag = 0 where id = #{_parameter}
mapper.select: select sum(giveMoney) from tb_give where trunc(giveRegDate)=trunc(sysdate)
select sum(giveMoney) from tb_give where trunc(sysdate-6) <= trunc(giveRegDate)
select count(*) from tb_project where trunc(projectRegDate) >= trunc(sysdate-#{_parameter}) and trunc(projectRegDate) < trunc(sysdate-#{_parameter}+1)
select count(*) from tb_give where trunc(giveRegDate) >= trunc(sysdate-#{_parameter}) and trunc(giveRegDate) < trunc(sysdate-#{_parameter}+1)
